select
distinct
aa.id, aa.user_id, aa.title, aa.create_time, aa.del_flag, aa.comment_count, aa.label, aa.type, aa.last_pub_nickname, aa.last_pub_time, aa.see_count,aa.content,aa.area,bb.nickname,bb.icon from fq_theme aa LEFT JOIN fq_user bb ON aa.user_id = bb.id
order by ${orderByClause}
